overview: When rumors of strange phenomenon begin to surround a local cemetery, a college coed investigates. As she delves deeper into the mystery, she finds herself transported into the lives of the local "residents". Soon, it's discovered that these locals have a passion for pleasure and a flare for fellatio! In her supernatural sojourn, this graduate student engages her mind and body with some high-octane bone-bouncing atop her very own possession...
title: Possession
